title: Nervos community hub
slogan: Nervos is a community-driven project that abides by the cypherpunk values of openness and decentralization across all verticals. If you're passionate about crypto and continually seeking to improve the status quo, Nervos is the perfect place to be.

community_fund_dao.title: Community Fund DAO.
community_fund_dao.description: Apply for grants through the Community Fund DAO, Nervosâ€™ ecosystem fund that supports community members organizing events, producing content, and building on Common Knowledge Base.

requests_for_comment.title: Requests For Comment.
requests_for_comment.description: Influence the development direction of the Nervos network through the open, community-driven RFC process. Learn more about it <1>here</1>.

nervos_talk.title: Nervos Talk
nervos_talk.description: Participate and discuss technical developments on Nervos.

twitter.title: Twitter
twitter.description: Stay up to date with the latest news and updates in our ecosystem.

discord.title: Discord
discord.description: Connect with Nervos core developers and contributors.

telegram.title: Telegram
telegram.description: Become a part of our vibrant community of meme connoisseurs.

reddit.description: Participate in regular AMAs with Nervos project developers.
